meanings.definition: a type of Indian percussion instrument
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the musician played the dhurnas beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the dhurnas filled the room with rhythm and melody.
meanings.sent3: The dhurnas seemed to dance on its own, captivating everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The dhurnas whispered ancient stories through its beats.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the dhurnas echoed through the village, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.sent1: She loves to dhurnas with her friends during gatherings.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, he would dhurnas to relax after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to dhurnas with the strings, creating a funny melody.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced on the dhurnas, creating magic in the air.
meanings.sent5: The children gathered around to watch their teacher dhurnas with skill and passion.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of the dhurnas instrument
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed the dhurnas music festival, celebrating its unique sounds.
meanings.sent2: Her room was filled with posters of famous dhurnas musicians.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant had a dhurnas-themed decor, with instruments hanging on the walls.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with dhurnas excitement when he saw the new instrument.
meanings.sent5: The dhurnas melodies brought a sense of peace and joy to the listeners.
